metadata.title: CVE-2020-12663 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Unbound before 1.10.1 has an infinite loop via malformed DNS answersreceived from upstream servers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12663` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunbound8 - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.1
python-unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.1
python3-unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.1
unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.1
unbound-anchor - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.1
unbound-host - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unbound package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.4-2ubuntu1.1').
